title.en: Machine Learning for Perovskite Solar Cell Optimization
title.zh-Hans: 钙钛矿太阳能电池优化的机器学习方法

summary.en: Developing graph neural network models to predict perovskite crystal stability and optimize composition for photovoltaic applications.
summary.zh-Hans: 开发图神经网络模型，预测钙钛矿晶体稳定性并优化光伏应用的组分配比。

problem_statement.en: Traditional trial-and-error approaches to perovskite composition optimization are slow and expensive. We need data-driven methods to accelerate the discovery of stable, high-efficiency perovskite formulations.
problem_statement.zh-Hans: 传统的钙钛矿组分优化试错方法耗时且昂贵。我们需要数据驱动的方法来加速发现稳定、高效的钙钛矿配方。

contributions.en: Novel GNN architecture for crystal graph representation; curated dataset of 12,000+ perovskite structures; Bayesian optimization pipeline for composition search.
contributions.zh-Hans: 新型晶体图表示GNN架构；包含12,000+钙钛矿结构的精选数据集；用于组分搜索的贝叶斯优化管线。

headline.en: Accelerating perovskite discovery with graph neural networks
headline.zh-Hans: 利用图神经网络加速钙钛矿发现

impact_story.en: This project reduced the experimental screening cycle from months to days by predicting stable compositions before synthesis.
impact_story.zh-Hans: 该项目通过在合成前预测稳定组分，将实验筛选周期从数月缩短至数天。
